Gérard Oury https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/G%C3%A9rard_Oury 0 Gérard Oury (29 April 1919 – 20 July 2006) was a French film director, actor and writer. His real name was Max-Gérard Houry Tannenbaum. Gérard_Oury ( 29_April_1919 – 20_July_2006 ) was a_French_film_director , actor_and_writer . His_real_name was Max-Gérard_Houry_Tannenbaum .
